description: Try our easy to follow Mango & Passionfruit Parfait recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango & Passionfruit Parfait Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cheeks off each side of each mango. Scoop out flesh using a large spoon. Slice flesh into strips or cubes.
Halve each passionfruit and scoop out pulp into a small bowl.
Beat egg whites until soft peaks form, gradually add caster sugar and beat until stiff. Fold into yoghurt until smooth.
Spoon some of the mango into each serving glass, top with yoghurt mixture then some of the passionfruit and a few cubes of mango.
